content: i often see requests in crochet groups for modern boy-friendly baby blanket patterns when i found out i was due with baby boy #3 i wanted the same this blanket pattern uses a modern ribbed edging on either end and the big bold color blocks are of alternating textures and are each separated by a thin white line for a modern finished look that has great visual interest without becoming too fancy this blanket would work great for a boy or a girl
